thread.title: WATCH: Chuck Schumer addresses claim of ‘fake tears’ by admitted he cried during ‘Free Willy’
thread.title_full: WATCH: Chuck Schumer addresses claim of ‘fake tears’ by admitted he cried during ‘Free Willy’

author: Greg P.
title: WATCH: Chuck Schumer addresses claim of ‘fake tears’ by admitted he cried during ‘Free Willy’
text:
WATCH: Chuck Schumer addresses claim of ‘fake tears’ by admitted he cried during ‘Free Willy’ Posted at 12:02 pm   Greg P. Share on Facebook Share on Twitter 
Sen. Chuck Schumer from NY is on “The View” this morning. Some highlights… 
He’s not a fan of President Trump’s cabinet, calling it the “worst cabinet I’ve ever seen in the history of America”: . @SenSchumer calls Pres. Trump's cabinet the "worst" he's seen in the history of America: "I was so disappointed." pic.twitter.com/uB8O2ZoFQp 
— The View (@TheView) February 21, 2017 
Schumer went on to say that he expects Republicans to start breaking with the president: . @SenSchumer to @TheView : "He keeps up on this path…within 3, 4 months, you're going to see a whole lot of Republicans breaking with him." https://t.co/hox0TQqtrM 
— ABC News Politics (@ABCPolitics) February 21, 2017 On the View Schumer wont engage on Qs on Trump's mental health," but predicts "a whole lot of Republicans" will break with the President 
— Deirdre Walsh (@deirdrewalshcnn) February 21, 2017 Sen. Schumer on @TheView : "When you talk to Republicans quietly … they are having real problems with [Trump]." 
— Ryan Struyk (@ryanstruyk) February 21, 2017 Trending Isn't   
And here he is admitting that he cried when the whale in “Free Willy” escaped in a bid to explain why he cried while talking about immigrants recently: Schumer on the View on Trump &"fake tears": "He doesn't know me…Who remembers the movie Free Willy? …When he escaped, I started to cry" 
— Madeline Conway (@MadelineRConway) February 21, 2017 "I care about immigrants." @SenSchumer responds to Pres. Trump criticizing him for crying. "They're the future of America." pic.twitter.com/u0dG31OEFr 
— The View (@TheView) February 21, 2017 
On Russia: Schumer says on @TheView that the FBI investigation into Trump campaign's alleged communications with Russia "may not be impartial." 
— Ryan Struyk (@ryanstruyk) February 21, 2017 
On Supreme Court nominee Neil Gorsuch: 
https://twitter.com/ryanstruyk/status/834083450420342784 Schumer says on @TheView that Chief Justice John Roberts has "changed the structure of America" to favor the rich. 
— Ryan Struyk (@ryanstruyk) February 21, 2017 
On the press:
